title: panic: runtime error: integer divide by zero
body:
```
Executing tests from //beacon-chain/core/blocks/fuzz:block_header_fuzz_with_libfuzzer

panic: runtime error: integer divide by zero

main.LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput(...)
        generated_main.fuzz.go:15
main._cgoexpwrap_e9a935528231_LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput(0x6120000439c0, 0x12e, 0x612000000dc0)

    #0 0x594a51  (/home/preston/.cache/bazel/_bazel_preston/6e220e5720b8243fd605645eb29a29ba/execroot/prysm/bazel-out/k8-fastbuild/bin/beacon-chain/core/blocks/fuzz/block_header_fuzz_with_libfuzzer+0x594a51)

MS: 4 ChangeASCIIInt-CopyPart-ShuffleBytes-ChangeBit-; base unit: 90dbf23cfad6a9ace0714349402f03b89ddb665b
```

The issue was here when `bp.CurrentEpoch` was zero.

https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/blob/de2ec8e575a8b9c9d6a188393e6778fa636670f4/beacon-chain/core/epoch/precompute/reward_penalty.go#L81
